SELECT processInstanceId,processName,deploymentId,startTime,endTime,deleteReason,userName FROM (SELECT processInstanceId,processName,deploymentId,startTime,endTime,deleteReason, START_USER_ID_ AS suid FROM (SELECT processInstanceId,processName,deploymentId FROM (SELECT PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId,PROC_DEF_ID_ AS pdid FROM act_hi_taskinst WHERE ASSIGNEE_=#{userCode} ORDER BY START_TIME_ DESC LIMIT #{start},#{limit} ) tabOne LEFT JOIN (SELECT ID_,NAME_ AS processName,DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS deploymentId FROM act_re_procdef) tabTwo ON ID_=pdid) tabThree LEFT JOIN (SELECT PROC_INST_ID_,START_TIME_ AS startTime,END_TIME_ AS endTime,START_USER_ID_,DELETE_REASON_ AS deleteReason FROM act_hi_procinst) tabFour ON PROC_INST_ID_=processInstanceId) tabFive LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_code,user_name AS userName FROM sys_user) tabSix ON user_code=suid
